                          <div data-pagelist-path="/content/experience-fragments/dove/us/en/header/master/_jcr_content/root/container_1039596113/globalnavigation_cop/container_423525235/container_261168562/tabs/container/pagelist.html/00011111012028/calming-moisture-night-time-lotion.html" data-list-count="5" data-total-count="5" data-filter-viewmore-count="3" data-filter-viewmore-label="view more" data-filter-viewless-label="view less" data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;pagelist-17134d7ddb&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/pagelist/v2/pagelist&quot;}}" id="list-17134d7ddb" data-article-brand-logo-enabled="false" class="  list cmp-pagelistv2   "> 
                           <div class="pagelist-wrapper"> 
                            <div class="pagelist-header "> 
                             <div class="pagelist-heading"> 
                             </div> 
                             <div class="c-page-listing-v2-filter "> 
                              <div class="c-page-listing-v2-filter__block" collapsefiltervariants="true"> 
                              <div class="c-filter__wrapper js-filter__wrapper"> 
                              <div class="c-page-listing-v2-filter__container">

                              </div> 
                              </div> 
                             </div> 
                            </div> 
                            <ul data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;pagelist-17134d7ddb&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/pagelist/v2/pagelist&quot;}}" class="cmp-list pageList" data-initial-display-count="6" data-featuretags-interaction="false" data-flagtags-interaction="false"> 
                             <li class="cmp-list__item  ">

                           <div class="pagelist-wrapper"> 
                            <div class="pagelist-header "> 
                             <div class="pagelist-heading"> 
                             </div> 
                             <div class="c-page-listing-v2-filter "> 
                              <div class="c-page-listing-v2-filter__block" collapsefiltervariants="true"> 
                              <div class="c-filter__wrapper js-filter__wrapper">

                            <ul data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;pagelist-498077f144&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/pagelist/v2/pagelist&quot;}}" class="cmp-list pageList" data-initial-display-count="6" data-featuretags-interaction="false" data-flagtags-interaction="false"> 
                             <li class="cmp-list__item  ">

                              </picture> 
                              </div> 
                              </div> </a> 
                              <div class="cmp-teaser__content">

                           <div class="pagelist-wrapper"> 
                            <div class="pagelist-header "> 
                             <div class="pagelist-heading">

                            <ul data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;pagelist-45bcc87fb8&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/pagelist/v2/pagelist&quot;}}" class="cmp-list pageList" data-initial-display-count="6" data-featuretags-interaction="false" data-flagtags-interaction="false"> 
                             <li class="cmp-list__item  "> 
                              <div id="teaser-556dd8cd14" class="cmp-teaser article-content" data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;teaser-556dd8cd14&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/teaser&quot;,&quot;dc:title&quot;:&quot;Explore Baby Dove&quot;}}"> <a tabindex="-1" href="/us/en/baby.html" class="cmp-teaser-image_link" data-cmp-clickable> 
                              <div class="cmp-teaser__image"> 
                              <div data-cmp-is="image" data-cmp-lazy data-cmp-src="https://assets.unileversolutions.com/v1/111650611.jpg" data-title="Baby in bath with hands up next to a bottle of Baby Dove foaming wash" id="image-556dd8cd14pageList1329373411" data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;image-556dd8cd14&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;core/wcm/components/image/v3/image&quot;}}" class="cmp-image" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject"> <picture class="lazy">

                              <div class="cmp-teaser__pretitle"> 
                              <p>Care for baby's sensitive skin and hair.</p>

                             <li class="cmp-list__item  "> 
                              <div id="teaser-90a1ee2ab7" class="cmp-teaser article-content" data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;teaser-90a1ee2ab7&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/teaser&quot;,&quot;dc:title&quot;:&quot;Beauty Portraits &quot;}}"> <a tabindex="-1" href="/us/en/campaigns/purpose/beauty-portraits.html" class="cmp-teaser-image_link" data-cmp-clickable>

                              </picture>

                           <div class="pagelist-wrapper"> 
                            <div class="pagelist-header "> 
                             <div class="pagelist-heading"> 
                             </div> 
                             <div class="c-page-listing-v2-filter ">

         <div class="content-panel-container" data-show-time="2" tabindex="0" role="dialog" aria-label="Sign up" aria-modal="true" data-view-type="signuppopupview" data-enable-on-every-click="false"> <button class="content-panel__close" data-cmp-clickable="true" data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;contentpanel-ac61d70860&quot;:{&quot;xdm:linkURL&quot;:&quot;/#closedelpop&quot;,&quot;dc:title&quot;:&quot;close delivery popup&quot;,&quot;href&quot;:&quot;#closedelpop&quot;}}"> <span class="cmp-ul-sr-only">Close</span> </button> 
          <div class="content-panel-experiencefragment"> 
           <div id="container-553e276723" class="cmp-container container-553e276723  " data-background-flag="false"> 
            <div class="embed"> 
             <div data-cmp-data-layer="{&quot;embed-d62f48d14d&quot;:{&quot;@type&quot;:&quot;unilever/components/embed&quot;,&quot;repo:modifyDate&quot;:&quot;2024-12-06T13:35:14Z&quot;}}" id="embed-d62f48d14d" class="cmp-embed  "> 
              <script nonce="NjE3MTM0">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
	function closeContentPanel() {
		const contentPanel = document.querySelector('.contentpanel.experiencefragment.horizontal-prm-overlay');
		const inputField = document.querySelector('.cmp-form-text__text');
		const signUpButton = document.querySelector('.sign-up-panel .cmp-button');
		const continueButton = document.querySelector('.continue-site .cmp-button');
		const closeButton = document.querySelector('.horizontal-prm-overlay .content-panel__close');

		const markPanelAsVisited = () => {
			document.cookie = `ContentPanelVisited=true; path=/; expires=${new Date(Date.now() + 864e5).toUTCString()}`;
			if (contentPanel) {
				contentPanel.style.display = 'none';
			}
		};

		if (inputField) inputField.addEventListener('keydown', (event) => event.key === 'Enter' && markPanelAsVisited());
		if (signUpButton) signUpButton.addEventListener('click', markPanelAsVisited);
		if (continueButton) continueButton.addEventListener('click', markPanelAsVisited);
		if (closeButton) closeButton.addEventListener('click', markPanelAsVisited);
	}

	closeContentPanel();
});
</script> 
             </div>

                  <script nonce="NjE3MTM0">
    document.querySelectorAll('.pdp-top-container .cmp-image__image').forEach(img => {

    img.addEventListener("error", function(event) {

        event.target.parentElement.querySelectorAll('source').forEach(src => src.remove());

        const isThumbnail = event.target.closest('ul.thumbnails li') !== null;

        event.target.src = isThumbnail
        ? "https://assets.unileversolutions.com/v1/114107637.png?im=AspectCrop=(90,90);Resize=(90,90)"
        : "https://assets.unileversolutions.com/v1/114107637.png?im=AspectCrop=(540,540);Resize=(540,540)";

    });

    });
</script>

                <h2 class="cmp-accordion__header"> <button id="accordion-e91c3a40ab-item-758f06238e-button" class="cmp-accordion__button cmp-accordion__button--expanded" type="button" aria-controls="accordion-e91c3a40ab-item-758f06238e-panel" data-cmp-hook-accordion="button"> <span class="cmp-accordion__title"> About this product</span> <span class="cmp-accordion__icon"></span> </button> </h2> 
                <div data-cmp-hook-accordion="panel" id="accordion-e91c3a40ab-item-758f06238e-panel" class="cmp-accordion__panel cmp-accordion__panel--expanded" role="region" aria-labelledby="accordion-e91c3a40ab-item-758f06238e-button"> 
                 <div class="productInfoItem product component-product-info cmp-prodcutinfo-under-accordion"> 
                  <div class="cmp-product-nutrients"> 
                   <div class="cmp-product-info-item"> 
                    <div class="container"> 
                     <div class="product-info-item-wrapper"> 
                      <div class=" product-info-item-content "> 
                       <div data-productinfo-value="<pre>
##unilever:product-attributes/retailerproductdata/retailerAboutThisProductBullets@@
</pre>
" class="product-info-item__item "> 
                        <pre> Moisturizing lotion that gently nourishes skin overnight

 Made with 100% skin-natural nutrients* for long-lasting moisturization

 Hypoallergenic cream created without dyes, parabens or phthalates 

 Dermatologist and pediatrician tested cream for delicate baby skin

 Infused with a calming scent of chamomile

 Certified cruelty-free by PETA</pre> 
                       </div> 
                       <div data-productinfo-value="<pre>
##unilever:product-attributes/retailerproductdata/retailerAboutThisProductDescription,unilever:product-attributes/productdata/productFormDescription@@&nbsp;
</pre>
" class="product-info-item__item "> 
                        <pre>When it comes to looking after your little one, theres one puzzle all parents want to solve: how to get your baby to sleep. Baby Dove Calming Moisture Night Time lotion along with a warm bath and baby massage can be used as part of a calming sleep routine.  

Formulated with 100% skin-natural nutrients (identical to those found in skin), this moisturizing baby lotion provides ultra-gentle care for sensitive skin. Replenishing skin-essential nutrients, it helps your babys skin retain its natural moisture while they sleep. If youre looking for a cream for newborn babies, this hypoallergenic lotion is one for you. Its dermatologist and pediatrician tested, so you can trust that itll treat the most sensitive skin with care. Four out of five parents recommend Baby Dove Calming Moisture Night Time Lotion as part of a  calming sleep routine. 

As part of our commitment to reducing plastic waste, the packaging of this baby lotion is made from 100% recycled plastic bottles.&nbsp;</pre>

And with a calming chamomile scent, this baby lotion is the perfect addition to babys nighttime routine. This scented lotion offers more than the gentle touch needed to care for delicate baby skin. It\u0027s made with 100% skin-natural nutrients, which are identical to those naturally found in skin, and prebiotic moisture to help replenish the essential moisture and nutrients that babys skin can lose overnight. The ultra-gentle, hypoallergenic formula is also created free from dyes, parabens, and phthalates. After washing your baby with Baby Dove Calming Moisture Hypoallergenic Wash and then drying, warm Baby Dove Calming Nights Baby Lotion in your hands and gently massage onto their body to nourish baby skin. \n\nWe know theres no right or wrong way to be a parent  only your way. Thats why Baby Dove is here to help give you confidence that youre providing the best skin care for your baby\u0027s skin. Our Calming Moisture Hypoallergenic Baby Lotion is sold in 13 oz. and 20 oz. bottles. Looking for something for extra sensitive skin? Look for Baby Dove Fragrance-Free Moisture Hypoallergenic Lotion.&quot;,&quot;productName&quot;:&quot;Dove Sensitive Skin Care Baby Lotion Calming Moisture  For a Soothing Scented Lotion Hypoallergenic and Dermatologist-Tested 13 oz&quot;,&quot;productType&quot;:&quot;BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH&quot;,&quot;subcategory&quot;:&quot;Hand \u0026 Body Care&quot;}}}"> <button class="product-variant-selector" data-gtin="00011111012028" aria-label="13 oz Variant Selected" data-isparent="true"> <span>13 oz</span> </button> <button class="product-variant-selector" data-gtin="00011111018396" aria-label="20 oz Variant Selected"> <span>20 oz</span> </button> 
                     </section>

 Overnight care

                  <div class="cmp-teaser__content"> <span class="cmp-teaser__title"> <a class=" focusable-anchor" data-cmp-clickable href="/us/en/dove-self-esteem-project/help-for-parents/talking-about-appearance/perception-of-beauty.html">Is Your Childs Perception Of Beauty Distorted By Media Influence?</a> </span> 
                   <div class="cmp-teaser__description">
                     Explore how retouched images of models and celebrities alter perceptions of beauty, and how the media influences your self-esteem, with our tips and activities. 
                   </div> 
                  </div> 
                 </div> </li>

                       <script nonce="NjE3MTM0">
    (function() {
        let adContainer = document.getElementById('adchoices-container');
        let adLogo = document.getElementById('adchoices-logo');
        let adText = document.getElementById('adchoices-text');
 
        if (!adContainer) {
            console.warn("AdChoices container not found.");
            return;
        }
 
        adContainer.onclick = function() {
            if (window.OneTrust && typeof window.OneTrust.ToggleInfoDisplay === "function") {
                window.OneTrust.ToggleInfoDisplay();
            } else {
                console.warn("OneTrust is not loaded yet.");
            }
        };
 
        console.log("AdChoices badge initialized.");
    })();

  <script nonce="NjE3MTM0">function initializeDynamicValidation(){const e=document.getElementById("root_optins_brandSMSConsent"),t=document.getElementById("root_mobileNumber"),n=document.querySelector(".rjsf");if(e&&t&&n){function r(){const n=t.closest("div"),r=t.nextElementSibling;e.checked?(t.setAttribute("required","required"),t.value.trim()||(r&&r.querySelector(".text-danger")?.textContent.includes("valid mobile number")||(r&&r.remove(),n.classList.add("field-error","has-error","has-danger"),t.insertAdjacentElement("afterend",function(){const e=document.createElement("div");return e.innerHTML='\n                            <ul class="error-detail bs-callout bs-callout-info">\n                                <li class="text-danger">Please enter a mobile number to receive text messages</li>\n                            </ul>',e}())))):(t.removeAttribute("required"),r&&r.querySelector(".text-danger")?.textContent.includes("text messages")&&r.remove(),n.querySelector(".error-detail")||n.classList.remove("field-error","has-error","has-danger")),e.checked||!t.value.trim()?e.classList.remove("checkbox-error"):e.classList.add("checkbox-error")}function o(){const e=t.closest("div"),n=t.nextElementSibling;t.value.trim()&&n&&n.querySelector(".text-danger")?.textContent.includes("text messages")&&n.remove(),e.querySelector(".error-detail")||e.classList.remove("field-error","has-error","has-danger"),t.value.trim()&&!e.checked&&r(),t.value.trim()||!e.classList.contains("checkbox-error")||e.classList.remove("checkbox-error")}function i(n){let o=!0;const i=t.closest("div"),c=t.nextElementSibling;e.checked&&!t.value.trim()&&(o=!1,t.scrollIntoView({behavior:"smooth",block:"start"}),t.focus(),c&&c.querySelector(".text-danger")?.textContent.includes("valid mobile number")||(c&&c.remove(),i.classList.add("field-error","has-error","has-danger"),t.insertAdjacentElement("afterend",function(){const e=document.createElement("div");return e.innerHTML='\n                        <ul class="error-detail bs-callout bs-callout-info">\n                            <li class="text-danger">Please enter a mobile number to receive text messages</li>\n                        </ul>',e}()))),t.value.trim()&&!e.checked&&(o=!1,e.classList.add("checkbox-error"),document.querySelector("#root_optins_brandSMSConsent + span .text-danger")||(function(){const t=document.createElement("li");t.className="text-danger",t.textContent="Please provide your consent to hear from us via SMS.",t.style.listStyle="none",t.style.color="#9e0000",e.closest("label").querySelector("span").appendChild(t)}(),e.scrollIntoView({behavior:"smooth",block:"start"}),e.focus())),o||(n.preventDefault(),n.stopImmediatePropagation()),o&&(e.classList.remove("checkbox-error"),document.querySelector("#root_optins_brandSMSConsent + span .text-danger")?.remove())}e.removeEventListener("change",r),t.removeEventListener("input",o),n.removeEventListener("submit",i),e.addEventListener("change",r),t.addEventListener("input",o),n.addEventListener("submit",i)}}function observeFormChanges(){new MutationObserver((()=>{initializeDynamicValidation()})).observe(document.body,{childList:!0,subtree:!0})}window.addEventListener("load",(()=>{initializeDynamicValidation(),observeFormChanges()}));
</script> <!-- Additional Bottom body Html ends --> <!-- JS path launch-footer-backup.js-->
